ul.li:
EPM was developed by the IBM T. J. Watson Research Center. The included macros base on the free macro sources that can be found in the EPMBBS package.
All additions by the netlabs.org EPM Distribution project come with a Gnu Public Library licence.
For contacting the project team, refer to the online help or to the NEPMD web page.
The documentation is still at version 1.0. Therefore many features are undocumentated and also some configuration items don't apply anymore. This will be fixed in a future version.
